DOC.detailed_description: The present study aim develop accurate , simple cost-effective method screen early detection uterine cancer woman use novel invention biotechnology method collection assay uterine cell . Results P2X7 assay use tissue obtain woman know uterine cancer woman histologically normal endometrium compare . These data also serve basis future study test predictive value method population-based study .
